solution_line_template: Miss Darlington picked {num_additional_baskets} x {blueberries_in_each_additional_basket} = <<{num_additional_baskets}*{blueberries_in_each_additional_basket}={blueberries_from_additional_baskets}>>{blueberries_from_additional_baskets} blueberries more.

So she had a total of {blueberries_from_additional_baskets} + {initial_blueberries} = <<{blueberries_from_additional_baskets}+{initial_blueberries}={total_blueberries}>>{total_blueberries} blueberries.
